title: Macs in the Corporate World
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/apple/Macs_in_the_Corporate_World]I have long wondered when the popularity of Apple’s line of Mac computers would breach the modern day corporate world. With the release of Unix-based Mac OS X and then the switch to Intel processors, not to mention the dual boot capabilities with Boot Camp and Parallels, Apple has certainly set itself up to break … more →
